1.title: Prima puntata

episode of.title: Il sangue e la rosa (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Count Uberto Mancini rushes from a bell tower throwing leaflets against the pope. To push it is a mysterious person covered by a red coat, of which the noble idealist trusted blindly. His wife Camilla and her son Giulio do not suspect that Uberto was killed but believe that death was caused by the last fatal imprudence of the revolutionary noble. Isabella, Giulio and Rocco grow together but love seems to divide them: the beautiful innkeeper has eyes only for young Mancini. 2.title: Seconda puntata

episode of.title: Il sangue e la rosa (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Discovering the existence of a grandson, the marquis Lucrezia Sciarra immediately goes to Cave, the inn of the three moons, looking for Isabella. He does not know that the girl is at that time in prison at Kruger Palace and is about to become the object of the desire for a turbulent festin from which he is saved in extremis by Rocco, who breaks into the villa together with two thieves, sent by Cesarone to a robbery. 4.title: Quarta puntata

episode of.title: Il sangue e la rosa (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Once again, Rocco saves life to Isabella and convinces her to return to Cave from her father, but Ludovico, who is a travestite dresser, appears at the Malvolti inn intent on killing Isabella. John, in an attempt to defend his daughter, is killed. Isabella, desperate, reacts and kills Ludovico then escapes to Rome. Thanks to Romulet, Isabella traces Rocco. Believing her sister, Adelasia welcomes her with affection, while Giulio is still in cloisters and confesses to Rospigliosi pretending to be sorry. Isabella Meanwhile meets Kruger at Damiani palace, where Colonel ...

imdb.plot outline: In the quiet village of Cave, Isabella Malvolti, the wonderful and restless daughter of the innkeeper, spends the days between the books and the general trials of the kisses exchanged with her only friend Rocco, a beautiful young man who works as a worker who has always fallen in love with her . One day, in the village, Giulio Mancini arrives with her mother Camilla. They found asylum at baron Andrea Forleis and his wife Barbara after the mysterious death of Uberto Mancini, revolutionary anti-papal and Giulio's father, who was betrayed on the eve of an uprising. Between Isabella, Rocco and Giulio will be born a triangle of friendship and love destined to collapse over time even when their streets seem to be moving away. The three - each in flight or looking for their own destiny - will find themselves in 800 at the beginning of the 800s, stubborn and rebellious, sharing experiences, adventures, dangers and mysteries.
imdb.title: Il sangue e la rosa
plot: In the quiet village of Cave, Isabella Malvolti, the wonderful and restless daughter of the innkeeper, spends the days between the books and the general trials of the kisses exchanged with her only friend Rocco, a beautiful young man who works as a worker who has always fallen in love with her . One day, in the village, Giulio Mancini arrives with her mother Camilla. They found asylum at baron Andrea Forleis and his wife Barbara after the mysterious death of Uberto Mancini, revolutionary anti-papal and Giulio's father, who was betrayed on the eve of an uprising. Between Isabella, Rocco and Giulio will be born a triangle of friendship and love destined to collapse over time even when their streets seem to be moving away. The three - each in flight or looking for their own destiny - will find themselves in 800 at the beginning of the 800s, stubborn and rebellious, sharing experiences, adventures, dangers and mysteries.
